pages.text: Welcome to $(thing)MC Critical$()! This book will teach you the various things you need to know to play the modpack.$(br2)

$(thing)MC Critical$() is a vanilla styled modpack, designed to give you the best Minecraft gameplay possible, while adding loads of new content that doesn't drastically change what Minecraft is all about.$(br2)Please take a little bit of time to read the entries here in the $(thing)Welcome$() category - they're not too long, and they'll get you up to speed with everything you need to know.
